metadata.description: Core U-CORE frequencies aligned with Earth's Schumann resonance and chakra system

frequencies.name: Schumann Base
frequencies.description: Earth's fundamental heartbeat - 7.83Hz base frequency for cellular communication and biological rhythms

frequencies.name: Root Chakra
frequencies.description: Grounding and stability - resonates with Earth's magnetic field for cellular coherence

frequencies.name: Sacral Chakra
frequencies.description: Creative flow and passion - harmonizes with Schumann 14.3Hz for emotional balance

frequencies.name: Solar Plexus Chakra
frequencies.description: Personal power and confidence - aligns with Schumann harmonics for personal empowerment

frequencies.name: Heart Chakra
frequencies.description: Unconditional love and compassion - resonates with Schumann base for collective heart coherence

frequencies.name: Throat Chakra
frequencies.description: Authentic expression and truth - facilitates clear communication with planetary consciousness

frequencies.name: Third Eye Chakra
frequencies.description: Intuitive wisdom and insight - connects with higher Schumann harmonics for expanded awareness

frequencies.name: Crown Chakra
frequencies.description: Divine connection and unity consciousness - bridges individual to planetary consciousness

frequencies.name: Soul Star Chakra
frequencies.description: Soul connection and transcendence - DNA repair and cellular regeneration for all beings

frequencies.name: Divine Light Chakra
frequencies.description: Divine love and sacred union - universal love frequency healing all life forms
